# uptimekuma_notification_lunasea (Resource)

Lunasea notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_lunasea" "user_target" {
  name            = "Lunasea User Notifications"
  target          = "user"
  lunasea_user_id = "YOUR_LUNASEA_USER_ID"
  is_active       = true
  is_default      = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_lunasea" "device_target" {
  name       = "Lunasea Device Notifications"
  target     = "device"
  device     = "YOUR_LUNASEA_DEVICE_ID"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `target` (String) Target type: "user" or "device"

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `device` (String, Sensitive) Lunasea device ID (required when target is "device")
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `lunasea_user_id` (String, Sensitive) Lunasea user ID (required when target is "user")

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
